title: Always Mine
description: A Timeless LoveThe great Lord Damron is no more than a shadowy, powerful presence in the ruins of Blackthorn Castle. But the compelling gaze of his portrait draws Lydia Hunter to stand before him--and fall through time to become his beloved Lady Brianna.A Fiery PassionA tempestuous man with an incendiary nature, whose fury on the battlefield quickly routs his foes, Lord Damron must claim his Scottish kingdom and his bride. But Brianna[s heart can be claimed in only one way--her way. And his iron strength is no match for her gentleness. . .
author: Sophia Johnson
